long_description: Keep your digits happy on blustery, damp rides. Wear the windproof, water-resistant Craft Bike Siberian soft-shell bike gloves with fleece lining for warmth. Stretchy, soft, polyester/spandex soft shells feature a windproof membrane. Silicone print on palm prevents slipping; soft terry thumbwipes manage moisture. Tech-compatible thumb and forefinger patches let you use your mobile device with gloves on. Craft Bike Siberian bike gloves have Velcro(R) adjusters to let you tighten the cuffs against weather, and reflective hits to increase safety in low light.
